description: This file contains code that sets up a reasoning agent using OpenAI's GPT-4 model to solve the missionaries and cannibals puzzle, and prints the reasoning process with a step-by-step solution and ASCII diagram.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI reasoning agent capable of processing tasks and generating responses.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing an OpenAI chat model interface used for generating conversational responses.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output the agent's response to a given task, with options for streaming and full reasoning display.
